definitions.definition: Singing group; group of people who sing together; company of people who are trained to sing together.
definitions.example: The church choir practices Thursday nights.

definitions.definition: The part of a church where the choir assembles for song.
(Christian angelology) One of the nine ranks or orders of angels.
definitions.example: Seraphim, Cherubim, and Thrones are three of the choirs of angels.

definitions.definition: Set of strings (one per note) for a harpsichord.
